enabled.charge_market_fee: The asset issuer can enable market fees.
enabled.white_list: The asset issuer can create a list of approved markets
enabled.override_authority: The asset issuer can transfer this NFT back to themselves.
enabled.transfer_restricted: This asset may only be transferred to/from the issuer or market orders
enabled.disable_force_settle: Users may request force-settlement of this market-issued asset.
enabled.global_settle: The issuer of this market-issued asset has the ability to globally settle the asset
enabled.disable_confidential: The issuer of this asset can disable stealth transactions.
enabled.witness_fed_asset: This market-issued asset can have its price feeds supplied by Bitshares witnesses.
enabled.committee_fed_asset: This market-issued asset can have its price feeds supplied by Bitshares committee members.

disabled.charge_market_fee: No market fees can be charged for this asset; only BTS fees will be required.
disabled.white_list: There is no approved list of markets for this asset. Feel free to trade it for anything on the Bitshares decentralized exchange.
disabled.override_authority: The asset issuer is unable to transfer this NFT back to themselves.
disabled.disable_force_settle: This asset cannot be force settled.
disabled.global_settle: This asset cannot be globally settled.
disabled.disable_confidential: Confidential transactions of this asset are permanently possible.
disabled.witness_fed_asset: The witnesses cannot feed a price for this asset.
disabled.committee_fed_asset: The committee cannot feed a price for this asset.

asset.name: Asset name
asset.onchain: This NFT is fully stored on the Bitshares blockchain!
asset.offchain: This NFT may not be stored fully on chain.
asset.precision_good: With a precision of 0, '{{short_name}}' is a non-fungible token!
asset.precision_bad: Due to not having a precision of 0, this is a fungible token.
asset.asset_ownership_burned: Asset ownership has been 'burned' by being sent to 'null-account'; this NFT's settings are now final.
asset.asset_ownership_warning: Warning: Asset ownership has not been transfered to 'null-account' yet; the settings and quantity issued could change after purchase.

buy.header: The NFT titled '{{title}}' ({{symbol}}) can be traded/transfered on the Bitshares decentralized exchange
buy.tooltip: Within the desktop app search for the UIA '{{symbol}}'

license.none1: The license under which this NFT has been released has not been provied.
license.none2: Holder license information has not been provided.
